rules.natural: If the employee attends the cybersecurity fundamentals workshop, then the employee completes the cybersecurity fundamentals module
If the employee violates the device usage policy, then the employee commits a serious violation
Either the employee violates the device usage policy or the employee meets all requirements
If the employee follows the device usage guidelines, then the employee does not violate the device usage policy
Either the employee follows the device usage guidelines or the employee receives clearance from device restrictions
If the employee receives clearance from device restrictions, then the employee does not violate the device usage policy
If the employee exceeds quarterly performance targets, then should the employee not meet all requirements, the employee gets a promotion
Either the employee exceeds quarterly performance targets or the employee achieves a project delivery milestone
If the employee achieves a project delivery milestone, then the employee receives recognition as an outstanding contributor
If the employee receives recognition as an outstanding contributor, then under the condition that the employee does not meet all requirements, the employee gets a promotion
Either the employee fails the technical skills assessment or should the employee not meet all requirements, the employee completes the basic certification training
If the manager approves the employee's transfer, then given that the employee does not meet all requirements, the employee transfers to another department
If the HR department conducts an interview with the employee, then should the HR department review the employee's transfer request, the employee remains in their current department
Either the HR department conducts an interview with the employee or the manager assesses the employee's fit for the new department
If the manager assesses the employee's fit for the new department, then provided that the HR department reviews the employee's transfer request, the employee remains in their current department
If the employee maintains their current position, then the employee completes the basic certification training
If the employee renews their contract, then the employee maintains their current position
Either the employee appeals a decision or if the employee passes the technical skills assessment, then the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
Either the employee accepts the outcome or the employee does not appeal a decision
If the employee disputes an evaluation, then the employee provides evidence
If the employee disputes an evaluation, then the employee does not undergo a review
Either the employee disputes an evaluation or should the employee not meet all requirements, the employee receives a bonus
If the employee passes the technical skills assessment, then the employee qualifies for advanced training
Either the employee passes the technical skills assessment or the employee receives remedial training
If the employee provides evidence, then the manager schedules a meeting with the employee
If the manager schedules a meeting with the employee, then the employee undergoes a review
If the employee faces disciplinary action, then the employee receives a warning
If the employee commits a serious violation, then the employee undergoes investigation
If the employee undergoes investigation, then the employee faces disciplinary action
If the compliance department initiates an inquiry, then the employee record triggers an audit
If the employee receives remedial training, then the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
If the employee demonstrates proficiency in the hands-on lab, then should the employee qualify for advanced training, the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
Either the employee demonstrates proficiency in the hands-on lab or the employee submits documentation of their experience portfolio
If the employee submits documentation of their experience portfolio, then provided that the employee qualifies for advanced training, the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
If the employee completes the cybersecurity fundamentals module, then under the condition that the employee does not meet all requirements, the employee receives a bonus

If it is not the case that the employee achieving a project delivery milestone results in the employee getting a promotion when not meeting all requirements, then the compliance department initiates an inquiry

If it is not the case that the employee achieving a project delivery milestone causes the employee to get a promotion when not meeting all requirements, then the employee record does not trigger an audit
If it is not the case that the employee requesting a transfer results in the manager approving the employee's transfer, then the HR department reviews the employee's transfer request
If the employee does not meet all requirements, then the employee renews their contract
If the employee does not meet all requirements, then the employee does not transfer to another department
If the employee does not meet all requirements, then the employee does not receive a bonus
